text: Laura Fraser (born 24 July 1975) is a Scottish actress. She is best known for playing Door in the series Neverwhere, Kate in the movie A Knight's Tale, Cat MacKenzie in the drama series Lip Service and Lydia Rodarte-Quayle in the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad and its spin-off Better Call Saul.FilmReference.com — Laura Fraser Biography (1976–) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Actors from Glasgow
title: Laura Fraser
